content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to activate the arcgis environment using various shell commands but encountered errors indicating that the necessary files could not be found. All AI suggested commands failed with the same error message. I received multiple messages from the AI. The latest development shows that I tried to execute shell commands with different paths, but all of them failed with error messages indicating that the necessary files could not be found.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": ". /opt/conda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate base && conda activate arcgis && echo \'Environment activated.\'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": ". /opt/conda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate base && conda activate arcgis && echo \'Environment activated.\'"}}}', type='ai_response')]
"""
